positions.title: Trustee
positions.description: Member of the Board of Trustees of the Princeton Public Library, the statutory board that governs the library and sets strategic direction. The Princeton Public Library, the community's living room, provides access to information and a place to meet and discuss ideas for the Princeton community. In 2016 the library had over 800,000 visits.

positions.title: MongoDB, Inc.
positions.description:
Oversaw the development efforts around the core MongoDB products and services including the MongoDB server, drivers, cloud services, education and integration tools.

Key accomplishments during my tenure:
• Shipped MongoDB Server 3.4 on time, including MongoDB OpsManager, MongoDB Compass and all supporting MongoDB Drivers
• Delivered MongoDB Atlas fully managed cloud service that includes MongoDB automation, monitoring and backup.
• Grew MongoDB University to over 200,000 new students per year
• Improved regrettable attrition rates within engineering to single digits
• Obtained record-setting Culture Amp engagement scores within engineering that exceed comparable scores at similar companies
• Introduced Objective and Key Result (OKR) methodology throughout company
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
GM of Cloud Services, VP of Education
positions.description:
As GM of Cloud Services, responsible for the MongoDB Cloud Services business. Launched MongoDB online backup and MongoDB Cloud Manager product. Responsible for customer acquisition, strategy and product direction.

As VP of Education:
• launched MongoDB University, an online education platform that (as of 2017) serves more than 200,000 students per year.
• Developed and taught the first online class on MongoDB, MongoDB for Developers.
• Responsible for overall education and training business including certification, in-person training and premium online education.

…
see more

roles.title: GM of Cloud Services, VP of Education

positions.title: Vice President, Mobile
positions.description: Directed Carbonite's mobile strategy. Integrated Phanfare team into Carbonite. Designed new mobile applications to synchronize photos. Advised CEO on strategic direction.

positions.title: CEO
positions.description: Phanfare offers subscription-based photo and video hosting. Founded company along with Mark Heinrich. Hired team. Implemented version 1.0 of the product. Raised venture capital and negotiated the sale of the business to Carbonite, Inc.

positions.title: VP, Research and Development
positions.description: Explored business opportunities for the company and evaluated new technical ideas. Did technical due diligence for M&A transactions. Held various managerial positions including running engineering team responsible for email marketing product, developing software for new email marketing product, and developing software for merchandising analytics.

positions.title: CEO
positions.description: Raised $1MM in venture capital and hired management team. Developed initial products along with the marketing and sales strategy for those products. Directed day-to-day operations. Flashbase provided end-to-end technology solutions to marketers for the creation and execution of online Sweepstakes. Negotiated the sale of the company to DoubleClick (Nasdaq: DCLK) in May of 2000

positions.title: Vice President
positions.description: Developed software for core trading system that manages inventory, analyzes risk and automates the back-office of BlackRock’s $100 billion asset management business. Worked on initial pilot project for Freddie Mac that would be come the Aladdin product.

given.text: Peter proved himself to be a intelligent and dedicated member of the Flashbase team. He showed flexibility and initiative, doing whatever job was required to make our startup successful. Plus, he's a great guy.

Dennis configured our Cisco office firewalls, specified our VOIP phone system and figured out solutions to tricky networking problems quickly and efficiently. I would not hesitate to recommend Dennis to others looking for help specifying, purchasing or configuring high-end networking gear.

We hired Steve to introduce the Phanfare photo and video sharing service to the world. We specifically wanted to target the industry and the tech pubs. He succeeded in getting us good hits in national publications and a profile within the industry that was disproportionate to our size and tenure. Steve is well known within the world of Photography and he approaches the industry with a depth of experience and authenticity that can only come from loving photography and having worked on the portfolio side of fence.
…
See more

Troy is a tenacious, detail-oriented business development manager who successfully introduced Phanfare to all the major players in the photo and video sharing space. He is a pleasure to work with and a great guy to have with you in the corporate foxhole.
